static int32_t I2C_v1_ctrlInit (I2C_Handle handle)
 

Detailed Description

IP version 1 specific I2C Driver APIs implementation.

This file contains the driver APIs for I2C controller.

Function Documentation

static int32_t I2C_v1_ctrlInit ( I2C_Handle  handle)
static

Configure I2C_SYSC params Disable auto idle mode Both OCP and systen clock cut off Wake up mechanism disabled No idle mode selected
